synopsis.text: High school junior, Naoki Kuzumi, finds his mundane life turned upside down when a mysterious red-headed girl, Mikoto Amagaki, falls from the sky and into his world. Having lost his parents in a tragic accident and living with his relatives, Naoki struggles with the void of his forgotten past. Mikoto's sudden arrival brings a whirlwind of questions and a quest to find her long-lost brother, who bears a striking resemblance to Naoki. As Mikoto's search unfolds, Naoki discovers a strange connection to her brother's misdeeds through vivid dreams and begins to question the secrets hidden within his own past. In this new reality, Naoki's once ordinary life intertwines with Mikoto's extraordinary journey, setting the stage for a series of events that will forever change his destiny.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
